This is a testharness.js-based test.
FAIL ORB should block opaque font/ttf assert_unreached: Should have rejected: undefined Reached unreachable code
FAIL ORB should block opaque text/plain assert_unreached: Should have rejected: undefined Reached unreachable code
FAIL ORB should block opaque application/json assert_unreached: Should have rejected: undefined Reached unreachable code
PASS ORB shouldn't block opaque image/png
PASS ORB shouldn't block opaque text/javascript
Harness: the test ran to completion.
